item.title: 一道面试题的思考
item.description: 面试时碰到的一道题目，题目的要求是： The definition of a Fibonacci sequence is like this: F(0) = 0 F(1) = 1 F(n) = F(n-1) + F(n-2) Now let’s define G(n) = F(n)/F(n+1). Golden ratio is the limit of G(n) when n approaches infinity. With all the above information, we have a way to estimating golden ratio g: Find
